name: Tito's Nightmare
description:
Game made in 48h for the IndieTales 2021 game jam

In this Tower Defense game mixed with Minigames  you play as Tito, a kid who is having a nightmare in which his own drawings are trying to get to his room. Your goal is to complete enough tasks to make it trough the night, while defending Tito's room from the evil monsters. 

Controls:

WASD  - Movement

Mouse Left Button - Shoot 

esc - pause

Made by:

mikomoares

roguetaver
